author: AP
title: Want feedback from Federer? Tweet him your volleying video
description: Roger Federer is offering stuck-at-home amateurs the ultimate online fantasy camp
content:
Roger Federer offered stuck-at-home amateurs the ultimate online fantasy camp of sorts, a chance to get tennis tips from a guy many consider the greatest of all time.
While people all over the world are cooped up because of the new coronavirus — social dista… [+2744 chars]
